page.title: 07CLUBS
page.content: Hope Village Hall, standing next to the school, is a purpose built building and is very well equipt, providing amenities for all the clubs and organisationsof the village.Every age groups activities are catered for, therebeing a thriving OAP group who have regular outings and parties at Christmas, and in Hope a well supported British Legion branch. For those who like a more physical approach, there is Hopesgate United the local, very well supported football club,who in the last few years have had a lot of success in the local league. A Yoga class is also planned for the Autumn, organised by a lady from Minsterley.
